title: Chocolate Oat Cake
ingredients: ['40g rolled oats', '110g butter', '225ml boiling water', '325g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '125g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder']
